and.name: Statistician
and.description: Statistician is a program that computes statistics for an arbitrary amount of data

or.name: FileImport
or.description: Input as a file with mutliple formats

feature.name: JSON
feature.description: adds JSON as a data input file format to the program

feature.name: DBsqlite
feature.description: adds database (sqlite3) file format as a data input

feature.name: ManualEntry
feature.description: Enables inserting the data manually just like a type machine

feature.name: GUITables
feature.description: Display the statistics computation results in GUI Tables

or.name: FileExport
or.description: Export the results of the statistics computation as a file with different formats

feature.name: TextFile
feature.description: Enables exporting the results in a text file format (.txt)

feature.name: DBSqlite
feature.description: Enables exporting the results directly as an extra table/view inside the database file (available only if database option was chosen as input method)

or.name: Statistics
or.description: Abstract feature which contains the possible statistics operations

feature.name: Average
feature.description: Adds the average operation to the list of possible operations

feature.name: Median
feature.description: Adds the median operation to the list of possible operations

feature.name: StandardDeviation
feature.description: Adds the standard deviation operation to the list of possible operations

or.name: Percentile
or.description: Adds the percentile operation with its different variants to the list of possible operations

or.name: ConfideceInterval
or.description: Adds the confidence interval operation with its different variants to the list of possible operations
